functions.tag:
{author:"Avantir Yihn",title:"Class Selection",resolved:1b,pages:["Your combat class will determine your starting equipment, but will otherwise have no long-term impact.","Warrior:
-Battle Axe (Medium-heavy weapon)
-Standard Armour (Slower, better defense)
-Enrage Scroll, Class 2 (Boost battle damage)
-Charred Death Pact Scroll","Hunter:
-Dagger (Weak weapon)
-Black Oak Bow
-Arrows
-Standard Helmet (Faster, less defense)
-Blitz Scroll, Class 2 (Boost battle speed)
-Torn Spacial Lapse Scroll"]}
